ygData.subject: Re: Blackened Iron Bastard Sword?
ygData.msgSnippet: With a party of lvl 24 plus you could easly take the knight and the rest of them if you stood at the top of the ramp and pulled to there. Personally i did it
ygData.messageBody:
With a party of lvl 24 plus you could easly take the knight and the rest of them if you stood at the top of the ramp and pulled to there. Personally i did it at around 24 but i had two other ppl with me, a lvl 28 pala and a lvl 28 cleric...

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-

-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com' EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Friday, July 16, 1999 11:44 AM
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Blackened Iron Bastard Sword?


From: +ACI-Whitcraft,David+ACI- DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com

And while I'm thinking about it, a quesiton for those of you that use
blackened armor. Is it better than banded? I heard it's about the same AC,
and is a bit heavier I think? Does it absorb more damage or what?

-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David +AFs-mailto:DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com+AF0-
Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 10:43 AM
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com'
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Blackened Iron Bastard Sword?


From: +ACI-Whitcraft,David+ACI- DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com

what's the level on the knight and the other mobs (dazed guards, elites,
shamans, etc)?

-----Original Message-----
From: Paul Fogle +AFs-mailto:pfogle+AEA-amtele.com+AF0-
Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 10:37 AM
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com'
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Blackened Iron Bastard Sword?


From: Paul Fogle pfogle+AEA-amtele.com

BIB is on the goblin Knight. At the bottom of the first
ramp, you come to a door, a tunnel going left, and a tunnel going right. Go
right at the bottom. Follow left wall around, past the water, into the nest
room.. there's a spot on the wall.. either green or purple.. can't remember
off hand. Anyway.. the Knight spawns there, but be warned, it's a VERY RARE
spawn.. I've been there waiting for 4 hrs and didn't see him.. Others say
it's random, sometimes they can spawn back to back within a half hour..
sometimes it takes up to 6 hours or so. He always has the sword though.
As far as blackened pieces go, elite guards and up will drop
them..

Good luck,
Needun Luve,
Rogue of the Rathe.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean.Clark+AEA-UCHSC.edu
+AD4AWw-mailto:Sean.Clark+AEA-UCHSC.edu+AF0-
Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 9:26 AM
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Subject: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Blackened Iron
Bastard Sword?

From: Sean.Clark+AEA-UCHSC.edu


Hiya all+ACE-
I'm lookin for some info (+ACo-spoil+ACo- me,
PLEASE+ACE-) on the BIBS. I know its in
Runneyeye, but was looking for more
specifics on the location, the MOB that
carries it, group lvl needed to get to /
obtain the sword, etc, etc. I
haven't spent much time in Runneyeye...is it
a good mid-level dungeon? it
doesn't seem very crowded..which would be a
NICE change after spending the
last week in Unrest+ACE-
Also, for those of you wise in the way of
Runneyeye...what MOBs drop the
Blackened Iron armor pieces? I know the AC
isn't great, and it weighs a
lot, but it looks very cool and I bet there
is a market out there for that
'look'.
Thanks in advance for your help+ACEAIQ-
Thoradin of Bristlebane
